name.zh_TW: 神絆的導師隱私增強器

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance privacy and personalize browsing on websites with this customizable extension.
short.zh_TW: 這款套件可客製化網站體驗，增強隱私，提供個人化瀏覽。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is designed to enhance personal privacy and individualized browsing experiences on the web. It offers flexible customization options for various aspects of the Crave Saga website, including page titles, icons, and browsing history, creating a more private and personalized browsing environment for users. The intent of this plugin is to allow users to enjoy the site's content while maintaining discretion in their browsing habits, ensuring a browsing experience that is both natural and tailored to personal preferences.
long.zh_TW: 這款擴展插件專為提升網頁瀏覽的個人隱私和個性化體驗而設計。它能夠靈活地自定義 Crave Saga 網站的多個方面，包括網頁標題、圖標以及瀏覽歷史等，從而為用戶創造一個更加私密且貼合個人風格的瀏覽環境。這款插件旨在讓用戶在享受網站內容的同時，也能保持其使用習慣的隱蔽性，確保瀏覽體驗既自然又符合個人偏好。
